website_summaries.verdict: Comprehensive kit provides high-quality components to tackle every task.
pros: A 60 piece kit means you’ll never be hunting around for the right tab
Separate dent lifter and puller, plus eco-friendly glue sticks for a well-thought out package
cons: Expensive – but highly rated by users

customer_reviews.title: So far impressed with product
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfectly to take out a small door ding in my new Mazda. Instruction video was very easy to follow. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Water Guy

customer_reviews.title: Well made, and much cheaper that paying someone to do it.
customer_reviews.text: The kit arrived and was well packaged. Product reflects Chinese manufacture, but overall well made. All different types of tools were packaged separately. The kit came with a zippered bag to hold everything. So far I have used on a small dent I had in my retractable tonneau cover. The product worked well to pull the dent. Next I went to a golf ball sized dent in my tailgate. I ran out of time, but the dent is much less noticeable. Not bad for a first attempt. Overall a good kit for the money
customer_reviews.author: Jivejo

customer_reviews.title: Not so easy
customer_reviews.text: Dont waist your money..... Bought this so I wouldn't have to go to a body shop and have them do it and repaint my tank. I used 2 of the glue sticks that came with it, to get a dent off the tank of my bike. And the only thing it managed to pull was the paint off the metal.. Used different attachments to see if they would work better, but needless to say they all work poorly. Followed the direction to the T, and before it could take any of the load to pull the dent out it would snap off of the glue.. Not pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Good for infrequent personal use.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the completeness of the kit that I purchased. It came with all the parts that I needed to remove the dents on two of my vehicles. The glue gun and glue were effective. I'm not sure if there is a difference between the two types of glue, but so far, I only used the black glue sticks. A couple of the purple pads stretched or broke before their dent popped, but that is my only complaint. I have not used them all and still have most of them. I wish this came with better instructions or links to videos. It would be helpful. I am waiting for warmer conditions before I try to tackle any more dents.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Seller and Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It works! It took a couple of times with the bigger hail dents, but it works! The Seller is fantastic with communication and very pro active on the pull tabs, letting you know if they break, to contact them. Some of mine broke and they sent brand new ones, enhanced ones free of charge. I had a dent from a shopping cart on my Beemer and it took the dent right out, one try. Use the alcohol to remove the wax or you will end up scratching your car. Read all of the instructions. I watched the video. Really useful information. I cannot be more happier with this product and transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have yet to use but I am confident that this will Git-er-Done!
customer_reviews.text: Due to the weather I have not yet tried to implement the dent removal system. It seems complete in its ability to do the job, however until I try it I will hold off rating it. February 2019 update. Although the weather has been an obstacle to completing my project, I feel confident that it will perform as described and have "upped" my rating to more accurately reflect my opinion of it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Wieczorek

customer_reviews.title: Plastic tabs do not stick to glue**UPDATE w/ great customer service
customer_reviews.text: First, the instructions are written in pidgin English, so some things don't make sense. That aside, the plastic tabs that get glued to the car pull away from the glue too easily. Not able to withstand the pressure it takes to pull a dent. UPDATE: After reading this review, BBKANG excellent customer service, offered to do a very simple refund. Good for them!
customer_reviews.author: clarity

customer_reviews.title: Works on Airstream trailers
customer_reviews.text: Product worked perfect, I practiced on my wife's car ( she parks by braille) I purchased to remove a crease on our new Airstream RV. Key was to use slowly, remove before the "pop" so as to not turn a dent into a bump. Kit says will not remove creases, but with enough patience, it will. I was impressed with the packaging, everything was there, I would buy again, but hopefully I won't need too! Airstreams have a super soft skin, so take your time, test a unseen area, then go slow! Great product from BBKANG!
customer_reviews.author: Reet

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: The tools are well made, but the glue is useless. The glue bond breaks before any noticeable movement in the dent. Very difficult to remove glue residue from the paint, and if it get on any plastic parts, they will be damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a pretty complete kit and had everything (minus the rubbing alcohol for adhesive removal) needed to remove the dents in my MG midget. It saved me a lot of time trying to use a hammer and dolly and I was able to remove dents that would be impossible with a hammer and dolly due to limited access to the backside. The tool quality is good and is sturdy enough for the job it does. Definitely worth the money. Next project is to try it on my sons pontiac vibe.
customer_reviews.author: Scott-e-b

customer_reviews.title: Dent remover
customer_reviews.text: This review is very premature, I have not had a chance to actually use the kit. I think a follow up a bit later would be advised Amazon. That said, it seems to have a lot of components and it comes in a very handy bag to keep everything together and store after use. It looks very complete.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Hail storm damage
customer_reviews.text: The tool kit is amazing! I had my doubts initially but turned out to be easy to use, it took a few tries to get the hang of it but the key is to be patient. Black glue light bond ,Yellow glue strong bond used 91% alcohol to remove it. I have removed most of the deep dents now learning the point and hammer to smooth them out. I had a couple tabs break on me and the company sent me replacements free of charge. Great customer service
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great kit, much better than competitors.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this kit is SO much better than the other one I ordered from “Manelord”, that kit sucked. This on comes with directions, a carting bag, and good quality tools. Even a little bottle for alcohol. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: magic man

customer_reviews.title: Good for removing hail dents
customer_reviews.text: Found the gold dent puller to be effective at removing hail dents especially on flat surfaces. To get enough stick, I let the glue dry about 20 minutes. Pulling the dent does take a strong grip. Be sure to use the 91% alcohol to remove the glue residual from the car and tabs. Overall, pleased with the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Yadi83

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works good as long as you know what your doing. Their are many videos on YouTube to learn how to use it. Only problem is you need to buy better Plastic scraper then the one that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: William Baker

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed . It is cheap so don't expect much. The glue gun stopped working after just 10 mins. The glue would not harden on the car and it was only 76 degrees that day
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit for a beginner! You cannot beat the price for everything you get in this kit. As many others have said, if you have not done this before, there is a learning curve and it will take you awhile to get your dent out. The tools are good quality, the glue gun is great quality. I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Dlugolecki

customer_reviews.title: Wow - I was surprised
customer_reviews.text: I live in the country and we get a lot of small dents in our trucks. This product worked on even the hard to reach dents. It has many parts for many different sizes and areas of my truck. It's well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive this in the mail as my truck has tons of little door dings and dents. When I opened up the package their were many different tools to get out different types of dents. After toying around with it a little, I learned the best ways to use it and got out a few pretty noticeable dings on my truck. Im very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Gold

customer_reviews.title: worked way better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Out of the 30 or so dings from hail damage in my wife’s car 2012 Honda Accord 90% of them came out pretty much completely a couple of the really bad ones you can still see a small dent but way better than what they were a couple of them actually came out the first time
customer_reviews.author: ass with a capital A

customer_reviews.title: Quality tools.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband to use on some small hail damage dents. Worked great. You can not see where the dents were at all. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kim from GA

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: To this product you have to be patient and try it repeatedly but after all it will work, remember it is more expensive and it takes more time to go to the workshop, after you see the results you will love it
customer_reviews.author: Rafael. Jose. C. E.

customer_reviews.title: Valuable well-made tool
customer_reviews.text: This things great. It was well worth $50. Has everything in it you need to get started just follow the directions. My wife had a door ding her right above her driver door handle. My first try at it I was able to make it I would say 80% better. I am sure the more you practice the better you can get. If you’re looking to buy one of these set the hook.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Although it did not remove every dent that I have it seems to work well for smaller dents. Make sure that you are in a cool area as the glue releases too easily if the temperature is too warm.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: This get the dents out.
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, this gets the dents out. The first dime size dent that I tried it out, came out on the first try. Customer service is great as well, they wanted to be sure that I was 100% satisfied with the product. Very happy with both the product and customer service provided.
customer_reviews.author: james houston

customer_reviews.title: just about a c omplete kit
customer_reviews.text: pretty well rounded kit with just a couple more tools to buy, but for a DIY person like myself it's a great start to fixing my own minor dents.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: worked great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great PDR kit, everything you need in a nice storage bag, I used it the day I got it and it worked great, we bought a new car and the first day somebody dinged our door, used the BBKANG PDR kit and you can't see the ding anymore, THANKS !!!!! I don't have Prime and I still got it in two days, GREAT SHIPPING!! sorry I didn't take any pictures, I will next time I have more dings to fix on a different car
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used it for my fridge dents!!!
customer_reviews.text: When I got this, I was so excited to use it as I needed it for my second had fridge that has dents. I used it rt away and tada! Looks like I have a brand new fridge again. Loveeeee it. So happy with my purchase. Now my husband is going to use it for our cars.
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle Sevilla

customer_reviews.title: Great dent puller!!!
customer_reviews.text: The pack is really well organized and has a wide assortment of accessories for all types of dents. A must have that will save you hundreds of dollars on dent repairs.
customer_reviews.author: nmateo

customer_reviews.title: Works well on hail damage.
customer_reviews.text: You get quite a lot for your money. I have only played a little bit with it so far. The body on an Audi S8 (2003) with a big dent, I was not able to get out. I have a newer car with a lot of little hail dents, and I AM able to get those out, so I'm pretty pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer K.

customer_reviews.title: Works better than advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product showed up way Before I expected. Worked perfectly on 2 dents that I was sure would not come out due to being on creases surfaces would buy and will buy this product again and again for the shop I work in.
customer_reviews.author: BRANDON

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of the top coat.
customer_reviews.text: I stopped using this product as it was pulling off my topcoat. I am not sure if my experience was typical.
customer_reviews.author: temcky

customer_reviews.title: Great kit and great service
customer_reviews.text: This little dent removal kit worked perfectly for me. I’m really surprised with the quality of the tools for the price. Also, the customer service at bbkang is top notch. I received an email about upgrading the tabs before I even received the kit. Too notch for sure....
customer_reviews.author: Corey Davis

customer_reviews.title: Did more than expected
customer_reviews.text: Worked well enough to remove most of the crease in my fender. This unit was not intended to fix this large dent but did a really good job of making it look much better.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Worked  great on stainless steel fridge.
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Fixed a dent on my stainless steel fridge. Note to self.. Anger management.. Don’t throw phone... 🙂👍
customer_reviews.author: Daddy Gaven

customer_reviews.title: works on small symmetrical dents
customer_reviews.text: Products work great for small dents. Don’t expect to just be able to peel the glue off. It’s difficult to remove and you’ll need a heat gun and some WD-40 to help polish it off.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use (according to my husband who used it) and my car is now dent free thanks to him and this! It was a small dent on my rear fender that was removed.
customer_reviews.author: Belle Esprit

customer_reviews.title: Takes alot of practice to use right. Quality is low.
customer_reviews.text: Typical generic Chinese import quality. Not suitable if you were going to use it alot.
customer_reviews.author: Mat

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION
customer_reviews.text: See pictures. Broke off on 1st use, happened at the end of the pull, same time as snap from glue letting go. Shot the into the door with enough force to chip the factory paint to metal. The good news is the ding is much smaller. Hope to complete the repair with a replacement kit soon.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Nickens

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! A+A+A+A+A+
customer_reviews.text: This Do It Yourself(DIY) complete kit is awesome. It will save you tons of money repairing your dings and dents yourself on your car.
customer_reviews.author: Joey D. Mostales

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. It takes some practice but will Pull many different types of dents.
customer_reviews.author: robert riessle

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well, removed several small dents from my trailer. Did them in small steps, patience is the key. This kit is a good value based on how much is included. There are some good videos on YouTube that show how to use this, worth watching before you start.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Kocher

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: When I received the PDR Tool Kit I found some parts missing. I contacted BBKANG and they solved the issue immediately. Thank you Rita for making it right. Haven't used it yet, but tools are of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jahn Wang

customer_reviews.title: Works great, good quality and value
customer_reviews.text: All the parts in the kit seem to be well made and function as expected. After watching some online videos, I was able to pop out a minor door ding about 90%- not bad for my first attempt at PDR! Overall, very pleased with the value this kit offers.
customer_reviews.author: Ed G.

customer_reviews.title: not working properly
customer_reviews.text: The glue gun is not working properly. I will return!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy as it seems
customer_reviews.text: As described, but when I pull hard or clamp to hard the glue stays on the car, and the plastic gripper comes flying off and dent stays there. Trying again to see if it’s me....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth Buying
customer_reviews.text: I have only tried it once, need some fine tuning.... Lol But, nice product, at a fair price, I would buy again! They will work with you!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Finale

customer_reviews.title: Great tool! Easy to use for anyone.
customer_reviews.text: If you follow the directions this tool is easy to use. Key to the ease in removal is the recommended type of alcohol.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L Ayers

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for paintless dent removal
customer_reviews.text: Very nice products, came with a bag to carry and store everything in and good quality equipment came with it and everything cin the bag came in it's own bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy S.

customer_reviews.title: Does work, but not completely on some dents
customer_reviews.text: I found the videos watched made it look easier than it is. Some of the dents did. It come all the way our. But overall a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL F.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service and excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Amazon incorrectly fulfilled my order however the company that created the product was quick to correct the problem. Tools worked extremely well and i am very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Dent Removal
customer_reviews.text: Pull tabs broke and promptly sent out more sturdy pull tabs. Great customer service
customer_reviews.author: L34P3R

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Worked well, you just need to take your time using it. Only downfall is it didn't come with good instructions.
customer_reviews.author: bart

customer_reviews.title: Works Good
customer_reviews.text: Works good, saved me alot of money on repairs. As advised, it will take time and patience, but worth the money. Good packaging and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Danno

customer_reviews.title: Works excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality kit, dents were easily removed and I saved money by doing my own repair.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great customer service from the company. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well
customer_reviews.text: This product does work very well,I would recommend it to my friends
customer_reviews.author: Gary L Worley

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Does what it was advertised to do and you don't need to be an expert to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Biesecker

product_meta.title: BBKANG Paintless Dent Repair Removal Remover Tools Kit- 60Pcs Car Dent Puller Kit Easy to Use for Small Dent Door Ding Hail Damage Repair
feature_bullets: 🔨 Easy Manipulate ---- Dent remover tools are simple design and comes with detailed repair introduction, most of the dent remover can be finished in half an hour. No need to wait for the car repair shop, several repair steps save your money and time.

🔨 Professional Design ---- Dent removal kit designed with leverage principle is ergonomic, efficient and labor-saving. Golden dent lifter can rotate the button to adjustable the height. Bridge dent puller can adjust the spacing to better fit the dents.

🔨 Durable Quality ---- The main repair tools are made of tempered high-carbon stainless steel, strong and durable. Dent pullers padded rubber feet protect the original car paint. All accessories are rigorously inspected before packaging.

🔨 Excellence Accessories ---- 100W glue gun melting glue with 3-5 minutes, built-in fuse and makes it safer. Eco-friendly glue sticks especially designed for car dent repair. Puller tabs are made of a special hardened material designed, strong and sturdy.( use 91% rubbing alcohol to help remove the glue)

🔨 Widely Used ---- Suitable for car dents removal, door ding and hail damage dent repair. Work for the dents on the metal surfaces of refrigerators, washing machines and household appliances. (Tip: This tool not suitable for corners or creases)

specifications.Special Features: Money and Time Saved, Don't Need to Take Your Car to the Body Shop, Easy to Use, Safe and Effective Repair, Paint Friendly
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars166 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
